replies.body:
If the bundle contains an Eve Icon or Emote, then you would earn some money from me :D

But I agree that they should make Masquerade available for a week, or so, for newer Eve players. Shadow doesn't need a discount because it's 520 RP for a 975/1,350 RP skin.

**I would like special Eve stuff to be available! Also maybe a mission since every other champion seems to get one?**
Bundles and missions only apply to new champions, not reworks. If you noticed, Urgot didn't get anything when he was reworked, nor will Evelyn.

Several older champions did get bundles on their reworks.
Sion is a notable example.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=LVd728KM,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-11T12:46:55.679+0000)
>
> Several older champions did get bundles on their reworks.
> Sion is a notable example.

Sej, too.
